flawed_nl_solution:
100% of men at the job don't have a college degree because 100 - 75 = <<100-75=25>>25
There are 32 men at the company because 8 / 0.25 = <<8/0.25=32>>32
20% of the employees are men because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=20>>20
The company has 80 workers because 32 / 0.4 = <<32/0.4=80>>80
There are 48 women at the company because 80 - 32 = <<80-32=48>>48
#### 48

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
